backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles, access-controlled requests, radio stream availability checks, and push subscription storage using http outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing recent CSS background updates, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short descriptions of their purpose and recent updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Debug notes documenting a TypeScript build failure caused by Node.js typings in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, PWA settings, Google Cast, and a fallback recovery UI for slow React mounts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, versioned cleanup, offline behavior, and push notifications with background asset caching.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that validates TypeScript config, checks for browser-incompatible code, and verifies asset references and service worker settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling playback state, navigation views, error boundary, and integration with service worker, notifications, and various UI screens.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt manager detecting device/browser conditions and showing install guides or triggering the install flow.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Displays a fixed bottom tab navigation bar that switches tabs using provided callbacks.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact audio player with album art, marquee title, and play/pause control, opening the full player when clicked.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Implements an accessible scrolling marquee for long track titles with pause, focus, and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a slider UI for adjusting an audio element’s volume, syncing state with the referenced audio tag.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and displaying status of push notification subscription with error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Modal form allowing users to submit song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset the app when updates or service worker errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Button for sharing the app using Web Share API with fallback modal and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays a show’s image, details, genres, and schedule in a clickable card layout.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Renders a red LIVE badge with pulsing indicator and radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Shows a small pulsing accent-colored on‑air indicator dot.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Renders a styled track notification with different visual themes based on notification type and optional dismiss handling.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data used for UI display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles auto‑resuming audio playback when returning from hidden, focus, or bfcache states, notifying parent if manual resume is required.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast availability, initialization, session handling, and media casting state for a given stream URL. Tracks device status, errors, and casting lifecycle via the Cast SDK.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles a favorite-station flag in localStorage. Provides simple favorite state and updater.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login flow, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes login and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures container and text widths to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties. Recalculates distance, duration, and remount key for smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Determines notification eligibility and triggers track, mix, or live notifications based on now‑playing metadata with deduplication. Manages permission requests, timing, and current notification state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles push notification subscription via Service Worker and PushManager, including permission requests and backend registration. Tracks subscription state, errors, and provides subscribe/unsubscribe actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the stream URL with fallback, checking stream availability, retrieving now-playing data, and submitting (future) requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update detection, reset logic, and related state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses the audio element when time expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing a screen wake lock based on activity and visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, responsive background images, and layout/base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a show browser with genre/day filters and clickable show cards using mock data.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Displays the home live radio screen with station branding, playback controls, and live status indicators.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Shows detailed now-playing info with album art, playback controls, sleep timer, and sharing options.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Provides app settings including notifications and a tool to refresh cached background images.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Displays show details with image, schedule, genres, description, and options to add to calendar or set reminders.
Captures and displays early startup errors, determining critical issues and optionally showing a recovery overlay.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility wrapper for safe Google Analytics event tracking, including playback and casting events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads an ICS calendar file for a show, including date parsing and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes raw artwork URLs into valid HTTPS URLs, handling relative, protocol-relative, and malformed inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, custom colors, breakpoints, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, versions, and architectural notes for build planning.
